about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: The Manager's Journey expansion is only available to players who own the main game and the Football Stars expansion!

You are no longer tied to a single club. You develop as a manager, raise your reputation, earn experience, discover new abilities and move to increasingly famous clubs. But even if you like managing just one club, this expansion gives you new ways to manage — from motivating footballers to the ability to get the footballer of needed class from the youth academy.

MANAGER’S CAREER

We have added a whole layer of new mechanics to help you write your own story as a manager. Clubs from different countries will send you job offers and give you objectives depending on their ambitions and positions in tournaments, while you earn reputation for completing tasks and the club management reacts to your successes. You will look at the game from a completely different angle and every new campaign will create a unique story just for you.

MANAGER LEVELING

You will earn experience as a manager. When you get new levels, you will be able to choose manager abilities such as footballer motivation, individual training sessions, more influence on the youth academy and more. It will also be possible to upgrade abilities to make them more effective. To sum it up, you will have more opportunities to have a strategic influence over the development of the club.

WORLD SIMULATION

SIMULATION OF OTHER CONTINENTS
Only your country and the Premier Leagues of countries on your continent were simulated before. All countries and all the leagues on your continent are simulated now. The Premier Leagues of all of the countries on other continents are simulated as well. You can also look through the league tables on any continent at any time.

AFRICA
The continent of Africa has been added, with 11 countries playing on it.

LEVEL OF FOOTBALL ON A CONTINENT
Every continent has its own level of football. This is expressed in the strength of the teams and the talent of the young footballers that appear in the youth academies of that continent. You can change the football level settings for different continents the way you like before beginning the campaign.

CLUB WORLD CUP

Every year, the champions of the main continental cups of Europe, America, Asia and Africa meet to determine the best team in the world.

OTHER NEW FEATURES

There will be other new features in the expansion as well. Here is just a small selection of them:
  • 20 new achievements
  • The ability to make substitution and change formation before the second half during the simulation
  • The away goal rule has been removed from cup matches However, you can use this rule for cup tournaments in mods
  • New countries have been added on every continent
  • New hairstyles, moustaches, beards and eyebrows have been added
  • New tracks have been added
  • New logo graphics have been added

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: Manager's Journey

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Football, Tactics & Glory: Manager's Journey - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Football, Tactics & Glory: Manager's Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x64 and above
  • Processor: 1.8+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0, minimal resolution 1024 x 768, recommended dedicated graphics card with 512 MB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start a career as a manager who is completely unknown and hired and fired by clubs depending on their results. Raise your reputation, earn experience, discover new abilities and move to stronger and stronger clubs.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Czech, Turkish, Korean, Japanese
